German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Kollegin f (genitive Kollegin, plural Kolleginnen, male Kollege)

  1. colleague, buddy, mate, workmate, fellow member, fellow student, fellow worker, co-worker (female)

Declension[edit]

Declension of Kollegin
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinedieKollegindieKolleginnen
genitiveeinerderKolleginderKolleginnen
dativeeinerderKollegindenKolleginnen
accusativeeinedieKollegindieKolleginnen
